mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID USERID, U.USER_NAME USERNAME, U.PASSWORD PASSWORD, U.PHONE PHONE, U.EMAIL EMAIL, U.STATUS STATUS, U.CREATION_DATE CREATIONDATE, U.CREATED_BY CREATEDBY, U.LAST_UPDATE_DATE LASTUPDATEDATE, U.LAST_UPDATED_BY LASTUPDATEDBY, U.PLATFORM platUserType FROM USER U WHERE U.STATUS = 1 AND U.USER_NAME = #{USERNAME}

SELECT U.USER_ID USERID, U.USER_NAME USERNAME, U.PASSWORD PASSWORD, U.PHONE PHONE, U.EMAIL EMAIL, U.STATUS STATUS, U.CREATION_DATE CREATIONDATE, U.CREATED_BY CREATEDBY, U.LAST_UPDATE_DATE LASTUPDATEDATE, U.LAST_UPDATED_BY LASTUPDATEDBY, U.PLATFORM platUserType FROM USER U WHERE U.STATUS = 1 AND U.USER_ID = #{platId}

SELECT U.USER_ID userId, U.USER_NAME userName, U.PASSWORD password, U.PHONE phone, U.EMAIL email, U.STATUS status, U.CREATION_DATE creationDate, U.CREATED_BY createdBy, U.LAST_UPDATE_DATE lastUpdateDate, U.LAST_UPDATED_BY lastUpdatedBy U.OPENID openId, U.PLATFORM platUserType FROM USER U WHERE U.STATUS = 1 AND U.PHONE = #{phone}
